title: Usually I don't mind other GDers...
body:
But lets be honest, there is a bunch of posters who just shouldn't post...

Not naming names, but there are a few " I haven't liked a single thing you've typed ever" kinda posters. Some people are trolly, some are just ridiculous, others are downright unpleasant to read their posts...

Guess I gotta fire up the blacklist for the first time :/
